"use client" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { useAuth } from "../context/AuthContext" import api from "../services/api" function AdminDashboard() { const { user, logout } = useAuth() const [clearances, setClearances] = useState([]) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true) const [selectedClearance, setSelectedClearance] = useState(null) const [approvalData, setApprovalData] = useState({ approval_level: "", status: "", remarks: "", }) useEffect(() => { fetchAllClearances() }, []) const fetchAllClearances = async () => { try { const response = await api.get("/admin/all-clearances") setClearances(response.data.clearances) } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching clearances:", error) } finally { setLoading(false) } } const handleFinalApproval = async (clearanceId) => { try { await api.post("/admin/final-approval", { clearance_request_id: clearanceId, ...approvalData, }) alert("Final approval processed successfully!") setSelectedClearance(null) setApprovalData({ approval_level: "", status: "", remarks: "", }) fetchAllClearances() } catch (error) { alert("Error processing approval: " + (error.response?.data?.error || "Unknown error")) } } const openApprovalModal = (clearance) => { setSelectedClearance(clearance) setApprovalData({ approval_level: "", status: "", remarks: "", }) } const getStatusColor = (status) => { switch (status) { case "completed": return "#4CAF50" case "rejected": return "#f44336" case "in_progress": return "#ff9800" case "pending": return "#9e9e9e" default: return "#9e9e9e" } } const getProgressPercentage = (cleared, total) => { return total > 0 ? Math.round((cleared / total) * 100) : 0 } if (loading) { return
Loading all clearances...
} return (
